name: Dr. Aarti Patel
details: Dr. Aarti Patel is a senior cardiologist with over 15 years of experience in diagnosing and treating heart-related conditions. Known for her patient-first approach and strong diagnostic skills.

name: Dr. Ramesh Verma
details: Dr. Ramesh Verma specializes in skin care and dermatological surgeries. He has helped thousands of patients with complex skin conditions and cosmetic procedures.

name: Dr. Neha Sharma
details: Dr. Neha Sharma is an expert in child health and immunizations. Parents trust her for her gentle approach and expertise with children's health.

name: Dr. Sameer Khan
details: Dr. Sameer Khan is a reputed orthopedic surgeon known for his advanced techniques in joint replacement and trauma surgery. Currently on a sabbatical leave.
